name: Budget Tracker 2022
description: Budget Tracker 2022 is a simple web application to track financial transactions (deposits and withdrawals) and is available even when network connectivity is not. Transactions are stored in a MongoDB database (NoSQL) when you are online, but in the event you do't have connectivity, a service worker and IndexedDB make sure that uou can keep using the app and logging transactions. Once you are back online, your transactions are automatically submitted to the database.
